game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a group of bandits who have stolen the sacred Acorn of Life, an ancient relic that ensures the village's prosperity. The villagers are offering a generous reward to anyone brave enough to retrieve the Acorn and bring it back to them.
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen Acorn of Life from the bandit leader, Grimgar Ironfist.
game.quest_giver: Thorne Blackwood, Village Elder of Oakwood

tasks.description: Meet with the village scout, Raven Swiftfoot, at the old windmill on the outskirts of Oakwood. She has information about the bandits' hideout.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the bandit hideout.

tasks.description: Infiltrate the bandit hideout and gather intel on Grimgar's operation.
tasks.objective: Gather intel on the bandit leader's operation.

tasks.description: Confront Grimgar Ironfist and retrieve the Acorn of Life. Be prepared for a tough battle!
tasks.objective: Retrieve the stolen Acorn of Life.

game.title: The Quest for the Golden Acorn
